source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_00<tab>Sister Airell has work for a willing adventurer once more.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_00<tab>聖アダマ・ランダマ教会のアイレルは冒険者に仕事を与えたいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_01<tab>Simple graves are easily overlooked in the ever-expanding lichyard. As such, they often go neglected when flowers are offered. Aid Sister Airell by placing bouquets of Nymeia lilies at five of these graves.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_01<tab>墓が多いため、離れた場所にある墓に花が供えづらいようだ。5つの「貧者の墓」に「ニメーヤリリーの花束」を供えよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_02<tab>You have made offerings of the Nymeia lilies. Report back to Sister Airell at the church.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_02<tab>ニメーヤリリーの花束を供えた。「聖アダマ・ランダマ教会」の「アイレル」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_03<tab>Sister Airell tells you that the lichyard was once a small and humble place before the Calamity. Ever since, the number of bodies needing burials has steadily risen, granting those who tend the graves nary a moment's rest.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_SEQ_03<tab>アイレルに報告した。この教会は、5年前の大災害の時に遺体を収容したことで、墓の数が何倍にもなったそうだ。この数の墓を管理するのは大変そうだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_TODO_00<tab>Place Nymeia lilies at the simple graves.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_TODO_00<tab>貧者の墓にニメーヤリリーの花束を供える

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_1<tab>So, you wish to honor the dead once more? Excellent. Make offerings of these Nymeia lilies at some of the simpler graves in the lichyard. The poor souls died alone, you see, with no one left to grieve for them.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_1ありがとうございます……それではさっそく、
「ニメーヤリリーの花束」を「貧者の墓」に供えてください。
縁者もいないらしく、花をたむける者もいないのです。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_2<tab>There are five such graves scattered about the lichyard that I would have you tend to. And remember, friend: mind your surroundings and pay the proper respect with each bundle of lilies... You're all they have.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_2お花を供えていただきたい「貧者の墓」は5つあるのですが、
裏手のお墓は見落としがちなので、気をつけてくださいね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_10<tab>Once more, you have my thanks. No doubt the souls of the departed can take some small comfort in the care you have shown their graves.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_10ご苦労さまでした……。
これで死者の魂も、少しは慰められるでしょう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_11<tab>In days gone by, the lichyard was a small, humble plot. But that all changed after the Calamity. The dead grew in number, and so the yard grew with them.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_11……元々、この教会の墓地は小さな場所でした。
しかし、5年前の大災害のときに多くの遺体を
収容したことがきっかけで、墓が何倍にも増えたのです。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_12<tab>It is still simple, despite its size. Of course, it's that selfsame simplicity that keeps it from becoming more of a priority for the Order. We can ill afford to assign adequate numbers to its keeping, just as we cannot charge the poor to bury or be buried.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_12ご覧のとおり、質素な墓地ではあるのですが、
貧しき者から埋葬料を取るわけにもいかず、
人手はいつも不足しています。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_13<tab>Yet that does not stop the many who come calling to see their dead put to rest here. Those few of us who tend the yard haven't the time to see to the offerings our piety demands.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_13しかし、今でも沢山の方々がご遺体を埋葬しに来られ、
私たちは墓に花を供える暇もありません……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_14<tab>The simple graves you visited belong to those who died alone. Let us pray the sweet fragrance you delivered grants some modicum of relief from their lonely solitude─if even for a short while.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL118_00627_AIRELL_000_14貴方に花を供えて頂いたのは、身寄りのない方々のお墓。
彼らは花束の香りに包まれ、孤独を一時忘れることでしょう。
……貴方の旅路に、ナルザル神のご加護があらんことを。
